medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient began intensive gymnastic training a year before presentation and subsequently noticed palpitations, fatigue, and dyspnoea on exertion. Symptoms progressed with ongoing training but resolved completely after discontinuing exercise.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Exercise-induced asthma; amenorrhoea secondary to low body weight.
medical_history.social_history: Patient used oral contraceptives, did not experience any intercurrent menstrual bleedings, had no dietary restrictions, and was a vegetarian.
